item.title: Follicular Unit Extraction
item.author: drvishal@kalpanaaesthetics.com (Kalpana Aesthetics)
item.description: Follicular Unit Extraction in Jaipur If you’re looking for a plastic surgeon who can give you the best hair transplant results, look no further than Dr. Vishal Purohit. He’s an expert in the field of follicular unit extraction (FUE), a minimally invasive hair transplant technique that yields natural-looking results. FUE is a relatively new hair transplant technique that has revolutionized the field of hair restoration. It involves the extraction of individual follicular units (groups of one to four hairs) from the back and sides of the scalp.

item.title: Follicular Unit Transplantation
